LANCASTER UNIVERSITY ROLEPLAYING SOCIETY

LURPS is Lancaster University's society dedicated to roleplaying of all kinds, including tabletop and live action games. For more information on what roleplaying is, check out the Introduction To Roleplaying page. If you want to get involved in tabletop games, see Get Involved. For more information on live games, see the Live section.

For more information on what roleplaying is, check out the Introduction To Roleplaying page. If you want to get involved in tabletop games, see Get Involved.
